entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
